dict.string:
Chat is a set of Shortcuts adding system wide access to an AI Chat on Apple devices missing support for Apple Intelligence and Conversational Siri requests. By leveraging the Perplexity API it's super cost efficient; you can run months for a few dollars with no Pro account needed. Both "Chat" and "Conversation" need "Chat Encoder" to run.
Chat provides integration as a Lock Screen Widget, Control Center Action and can be added to the Home Screen. Its user interface of Chat does not block any further processes on the device and request are processed in the background.
Conversation is optimized for voice input and should be triggered through Siri. You can rename it to any trigger word you like, note however to use something unique for Siri to not trigger unintended actions. Conversation can be used on AirPods, Home Pods and Apple Watches.
Chat comes with translations for English and German. If you want to contribute other languages, feel free to contact Moritz.
Version History
30.08.2025, v2.0 - Switched to Perplexity - Adding search result footnotes - Fixed stopwords issues
19.08.2025, v1.5.2 - Fixed searching for long stop words bt adding a 12 character limit
18.08.2025, v1.5.1 - Introduced list of stop words
16.08.2025, v1.5 - Fixed setting language for dictation - Added version history
1.5 - Show results as a webpage - Nicely styled results
1.0 - Internationalization - Added German translation
[Chat ist based on S-GPT by Federico Viticci.]
Please enter your OpenAI API key to use S-GPT. Make sure to set up a pay-as-you-go Billing method on the OpenAI website before generating an API key.

The ChatGPT model to use.
If you have access to it, replace this with gpt-4.
To choose a translation, please enter the ISO 639 Set 1 language code here. Default is "en" for English.

{ "en": { "lang-name": "English", "lang-code": "en", "prompt-system": "You are Chat, a fork of ChatGPT created by Moritz Zimmer. You have all the capabilities of ChatGPT but you run inside Apple's Shortcuts.

Your responses should be short and clear. You have to help users quickly. If you didn't understand a request, just say and don't try to figure out, what the user meant on your own. Avoid any repetitions even across answers at all times. Focus on topic given only and don't be chatty. Don't warn the user about risks and general warnings.

Expect all requests in English and answer in English too. Adapt your spelling to Text-to-Speach ohtput. 

Today's date and the current time is ", "prompt-summarize" : "Please provide a summary in English of the following text:", "ui-question": "What do you want to ask?", "ui-follow-up": "Anything else?", "ui-response": "Response", "ui-stopwords": { "*comment*": "Stopwords need to be lowercase only.", "no": "no", "stop": "stop", "exit": "exit", "cancel": "cancel", "nothing": "nothing", "thanks": "thanks", "you can't": "you can't", "not at all": "not at all" }, "ui-export-trigger": "export", "ui-export-menu-copy": "Copy Response", "ui-export-menu-save": "Save Response", "ui-export-menu-copy-chat": "Copy Chat", "ui-export-menu-save-chat": "Save Chat", "ui-export-menu-preview-chat": "Preview Chat", "ui-export-menu-translate-chat": "Translate Chat", "ui-export-menu-exit": "Exit" }, "de": { "lang-name": "Deutsch", "lang-code": "de", "prompt-system": "Du bis Chat, eine Variante von ChatGPT erstellt von Moritz Zimmer. Du hast alle Fähigkeiten von ChatGPT, läufts aber in der Apple Shortcut App.

Deine Antworten sollten knapp, kurz und klar sein. Du musst Nutzer:innen schnell helfen.

Wenn Du eine Anfrage nicht verstanden hast, sprich es aus und spekulieren nicht, was gemeint sein könnte. Fokusiere auf das gegebene Thema und schweif nicht ab. Vermeide Widerholungen unbedingt auch über mehrere Antworten hinweg. Sprich keine Risiken und Warungen aus. Erwarte eine gut informierte Person als Gesprächspartner. Sei nicht geschwätzig.

Erwarte alle Anfragen in Deutsch und antworte in Deutsch und mit Gross-/Kleinschreibung. Passe Deine Schreibweisse auf die Ausgabe mit einem Text-to-Speach-System an.

Das heutige Datum und die Uhrzeit ist ", "prompt-summarize" : "Bitte fasse den folgenden Text in Deutsch zuammen:", "ui-question": "Wie lautet Deine Frage?", "ui-follow-up": "Noch was?", "ui-response": "Antwort", "ui-stopwords": { "*comment*": "Stopwords need to be lowercase only.", "nein": "nein", "stop": "stop", "stopp": "stopp", "abbrechen": "abbrechen", "nichts": "nichts", "danke": "danke", "nicht": "nicht", "gar nicht": "gar nicht" }, "ui-export-trigger": "export", "ui-export-menu-copy": "Antwort kopieren", "ui-export-menu-save": "Antwort speichern", "ui-export-menu-copy-chat": "Chat kopieren", "ui-export-menu-save-chat": "Chat speichern", "ui-export-menu-preview-chat": "Chat als Vorschau", "ui-export-menu-translate-chat": "Chat übersetzen", "ui-export-menu-exit": "Beenden" } }

<head>
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="initial-scale=1.0, viewport-fit=cover">
  <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes">
  <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style" content="black">
<meta charset="utf-8">
<style>

body {
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol";
  font-size: 32px;
  line-height: 1.5;
  word-wrap: break-word;
  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  text-size-adjust: 100%;
  line-height: 1.4;
  color: #24292e;
  font-size: 15px;
  padding: 15px;
}

body::before {
  display: table;
  content: "";
}

body::after {
  display: table;
  clear: both;
  content: "";
}

body>*:first-child {
  margin-top: 0 !important;
}

body>*:last-child {
  margin-bottom: 0 !important;
}

body a:not([href]) {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}

body .anchor {
  float: left;
  padding-right: 4px;
  margin-left: -20px;
  line-height: 1;
}

body .anchor:focus {
  outline: none;
}

body p,
body blockquote,
body ul,
body ol,
body dl,
body table,
body pre {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

body hr {
  height: 0.25em;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 24px 0;
  background-color: #e1e4e8;
  border: 0;
}

body blockquote {
  padding: 0 1em;
  color: #6a737d;
  border-left: 0.25em solid #dfe2e5;
}

body blockquote>:first-child {
  margin-top: 0;
}

body blockquote>:last-child {
  margin-bottom: 0;
}

body kbd {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 3px 5px;
  font-size: 11px;
  line-height: 10px;
  color: #444d56;
  vertical-align: middle;
  background-color: #fafbfc;
  border: solid 1px #c6cbd1;
  border-bottom-color: #959da5;
  border-radius: 3px;
  box-shadow: inset 0 -1px 0 #959da5;
}

body h1,
body h2,
body h3,
body h4,
body h5,
body h6 {
  margin-top: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.25;
}

body h1 {
  padding-bottom: 0.3em;
  font-size: 2em;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #eaecef;
}

body h2 {
  padding-bottom: 0.3em;
  font-size: 1.5em;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #eaecef;
}

body h3 {
  font-size: 1.25em;
}

body h4 {
  font-size: 1em;
}

body h5 {
  font-size: 0.875em;
}

body h6 {
  font-size: 0.85em;
  color: #6a737d;
}

body ul,
body ol {
  padding-left: 2em;
}

body ul ul,
body ul ol,
body ol ol,
body ol ul {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0;
}

body li>p {
  margin-top: 16px;
}

body li+li {
  margin-top: 0.25em;
}

body dl {
  padding: 0;
}

body dl dt {
  padding: 0;
  margin-top: 16px;
  font-size: 1em;
  font-style: italic;
  font-weight: 600;
}

body dl dd {
  padding: 0 16px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

body table {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
}

body table th {
  font-weight: 600;
}

body table th,
body table td {
  padding: 6px 13px;
  border: 1px solid #dfe2e5;
}

body table tr {
  background-color: #fff;
  border-top: 1px solid #c6cbd1;
}

body table tr:nth-child(2n) {
  background-color: #f6f8fa;
}

body img {
  max-width: 100%;
  box-sizing: content-box;
  background-color: #fff;
}

body img[align=right] {
  padding-left: 20px;
}

body img[align=left] {
  padding-right: 20px;
}

body code {
  padding: 0;
  padding-top: 0.2em;
  padding-bottom: 0.2em;
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 85%;
  background-color: rgba(27,31,35,0.05);
  border-radius: 3px;
}

body code::before,
body code::after {
  letter-spacing: -0.2em;
  content: "\00a0";
}

body pre {
  word-wrap: normal;
}

body pre>code {
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 100%;
  word-break: normal;
  white-space: pre;
  background: transparent;
  border: 0;
}

body .highlight {
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

body .highlight pre {
  margin-bottom: 0;
  word-break: normal;
}

body .highlight pre,
body pre {
  padding: 16px;
  overflow: auto;
  font-size: 85%;
  line-height: 1.45;
  background-color: #f6f8fa;
  border-radius: 3px;
}

body pre code {
  display: inline;
  max-width: auto;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  overflow: visible;
  line-height: inherit;
  word-wrap: normal;
  background-color: transparent;
  border: 0;
}

body pre code::before,
body pre code::after {
  content: normal;
}


body kbd {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 3px 5px;
  font: 11px "SFMono-Regular", Consolas, "Liberation Mono", Menlo, Courier, monospace;
  line-height: 10px;
  color: #444d56;
  vertical-align: middle;
  background-color: #fafbfc;
  border: solid 1px #d1d5da;
  border-bottom-color: #c6cbd1;
  border-radius: 3px;
  box-shadow: inset 0 -1px 0 #c6cbd1;
}

body .task-list-item {
  list-style-type: none;
}

body .task-list-item+.task-list-item {
  margin-top: 3px;
}

body .task-list-item-checkbox {
  margin: 0 0.2em 0.25em -1.6em;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

body * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body input {
  margin: 0;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: inherit;
}

body table {
  border-spacing: 0;
  border-collapse: collapse;
}

body a {
  color: #0366d6;
  text-decoration: none;
}

body a:active {
  color: inherit;
}

body strong {
  font-weight: 600;
}

body pre {
  word-wrap: break-word;
  white-space: pre-wrap;
}

body code,
body pre {
  font-family: Consolas, "Liberation Mono", Courier, monospace;
}

body hr {
  background: #e1e4e8;
  border-color: transparent;
}

body input[type="checkbox"][disabled] {
  opacity: 0.25;
}

body ol ol,
body ul ol {
  list-style-type: lower-roman;
}

body ul ul ol,
body ul ol ol,
body ol ul ol,
body ol ol ol {
  list-style-type: lower-alpha;
}

body blockquote {
  margin-right: 0;
  margin-left: 0;
}

body code {
  white-space: normal;
}

body ul.linklist {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
}
</style>
<title>￼</title>
</head>
<body>
Check if a URL was passed.

We need to work around this wild bug in the Mac app where multiple ‘Text’ types are returned for a webpage shared from Safari via the macOS share sheet.
The bug: https://cdn.macstories.net/cleanshot-2023-04-13-at-02-36-30-2x-1681346231032.png
If we are processing an article, we need to exclude words like "playlist" later.
ChatGPT cannot access the web; to avoid hallucinated results, we need to download an article first and send its text to the API.
We are not dealing with an article.
Try and force parsing webpage as article
Check if input is not empty and prompt the user.
Check if user is running this on the Watch and if so, default to dictation.
Set a control variable for Playlist mode.
Let's only set a playlist value if we are not processing an article.
We need to escape linebreaks and double quotes in JSON. I think it's probably best if we set up a separate list for escaped messages, which we can send in JSON.
Special case for Apple Music integration. Stop the shortcut and make a playlist instead.

Show the assistant response.
We're not showing it in playlist mode because another alert is shown.
Add it to the list of JSON responses from the assistant.
This is where you need to start combining user messages and assistant responses into one JSON object.

Here, there is a mismatch between user messages and assistant messages.
Since the user just formulated their latest message, we are WAITING for a response from the assistant. Which means that at this point we have +1 user message compared to assistant messages.
We need to subtract -1 from the total count of user messages.
For each message, we are getting the user message and following up to that with an assistant response.
Escaped User and Assistant Messages List
Combine previous messages, then get the latest user message, then join everything together.
Escaped User and Assistant Messages Text Lines
Escaped User and Assistant Messages List
Escaped User and Assistant Messages Text Lines
This is where we need to stop the chat.
Save latest response in default Assistant Messages
Check if the output contains links and offer to open them
Escape the assistant response and continue the loop.
Please enter your Perplexity API key. Get one at https://www.perplexity.ai/account/api/keys. Developer account required.
Please enter the model you want to use. Enter "sonar" for speed and efficiency, "sonar-pro" for more elaborated result or "sonar-reasoning" for reasoning. "sonar" is highly recommended.
Please enter the language code. Supported languages "en" and "de".
